title: Watchception
summary: The dialers of time watch face
developerAddress: House # 616, Street # 69, Sector I-8/3, Islamabad, Pakistan.
description: See the different dialer for every element that is related to time.  The circle in the middle is showing the gauge of hours. The second gauge is of minutes and the outer one is for seconds. The theme is of white background with red needles of time. The random movement of the needles seems very technical. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which save the battery just by showing the time.-No Ambient Mode
descriptionHTML:
See the different dialer for every element that is related to time. The circle in the middle is showing the gauge of hours. The second gauge is of minutes and the outer one is for seconds. The theme is of white background with red needles of time. The random movement of the needles seems very technical. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which save the battery just by showing the time.

-No Ambient Mode
